"Raising your Power Level: Part 2":
"There are a number of other ways to raise your Power Level:
・Learn Class Skills
・Add Special Abilities to your equipment"

"You can learn Class Skills from the Class Counter at the ARKS base in each region.

Sub Class Skills count towards your Power Level as well."

"You can add Special Abilities to your equipment by selecting \"Add Special Abilities\" from the Item Lab at the ARKS base in each region.

To add Special Abilities to your equipment, you will need Special Ability Capsules and N-Meseta."

"To achieve a Power Level of 950, aim to do all of the below:
・Reach Lv.10 with your Main Class
・Learn 8 Class Skills between your Main Class and your Sub Class
・Grind a ★1 weapon to +20
・Grind a set of ★1 armor to +10
・Add a total of 4 Special Abilities to your weapons and armor"
